Package portfolio

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GUI
    GUI Class: child class of JFrame.
    Investment
    Investment Class has six instance variables which define every investment in this project.
    MutualFund
    MutualFund Class: child class of the Investment class.
    Portfolio
    Portfolio class: class runs the main method and proceeds to run the GUI.
    Stock
    Stock Class: child class of the Investment class.
